FusionEngine::FusionProjectile

Detailed Description

Holds all state information for each projectile.

An instance of this object holds the state data for each projectile in the game. This object should remain general enough to be used by client and server.

Remarks:
When a weapon fires, and instance of this class is produced.

Member Data Documentation

ShipState FusionEngine::FusionProjectile::CurrentState

I don't think there's much point protecting these, that'll just make everything more complicated. External classes (such as ServerEnvironment) can just access these directly. :P If you wan't it to be more ObjectO, (i.e. uses member funcions to access these) tell me and I _might_ get around to it.
